meanings.definition: A Chinese game played with tiles.
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we played mahjonggs together.
meanings.sent2: Let's invite our friends over to play mahjonggs this weekend.
meanings.sent3: Grandma always wins at mahjonggs, she's a tile-matching master!
meanings.sent4: The clacking of mahjonggs tiles sounded like a symphony of strategy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful mahjonggs tiles clicked together in a satisfying rhythm.

meanings.definition: A set of tiles used in the game of mahjonggs.
meanings.sent1: I received a beautiful mahjonggs set as a birthday gift.
meanings.sent2: Make sure all the mahjonggs are neatly stacked before we start the game.
meanings.sent3: The missing mahjonggs tile turned up in the dog's toy box!
meanings.sent4: The mahjonggs set gleamed in the sunlight, each tile a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the mahjonggs tiles fascinated me as I played.
